params.relayer: The address of the relayer which executed the callback

params.addedFee: The fee amount that added newly
params.totalFee: The total fee amount, can be bumped by multiple times

params.data: The returnData from the execution on the destination domain
params.message: The message sent to the destination domain
params.originAndNonce: Domain where the transfer originated and the unique identifier for the message from origin to destination, combined in a single field ((origin << 32) & nonce)
params.success: The return success from the execution on the destination domain

params.data: The returnData from the execution on the destination domain
params.domain: The domain where to execute the callback
params.message: The message sent to the destination domain
params.success: The return success from the execution on the destination domain

params._transferId: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction

params._domain: The domain of the remote xApp Router
params._router: The address of the remote xApp Router

params._nonce: The unique identifier for the message from origin to destination

params._transferId: - The unique identifier of the crosschain transaction

params._callbackAddress: A callback address to be called when promise callback is received
params._domain: The domain where to execute callback

setConnext(address).details: Connext and relayer fee router store references to each other

params._connext: The address of the Connext implementation

params._xAppConnectionManager: The address of the xAppConnectionManager contract

callbackFees.details: This will track all the callback fees for each transferId. Can add while xcall or bumping callback fee

promiseMessages.details: While handling the message, it will parse transferId from incomming message and store the message in the mapping

CallbackFeeAdded(bytes32,uint256,uint256.notice: Emitted when transaction fee for callback added

Receive(uint64,uint32,bytes32,address,bo.notice: Emitted when a promise callback message has arrived to this domain

Send(uint32,bytes32,bytes32,address,bool.notice: Emitted when a promise callback has been sent from this domain

SetConnext(address).notice: Emitted when a new Connext address is set

acceptProposedOwner().notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

assetOwnershipTimestamp().notice: Returns the timestamp when asset ownership was last proposed to be renounced

bumpCallbackFee(bytes32).notice: This function will be called on the origin domain to increase the callback fee

callbackFees(bytes32).notice: Mapping of transferId to callback fee

delay().notice: Returns the delay period before a new owner can be accepted.

enrollRemoteRouter(uint32,bytes32).notice: Register the address of a Router contract for the same xApp on a remote chain

initCallbackFee(bytes32).notice: This function will be called on the origin domain to init the callback fee while xcall

isAssetOwnershipRenounced().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the asset whitelist has been renounced

isRouterOwnershipRenounced().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the router whitelist has been renounced

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

promiseMessages(bytes32).notice: Mapping of transferId to promise callback messages

proposeAssetOwnershipRenunciation().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the asset whitelist has been renounced

proposeNewOwner(address).notice: Sets the timestamp for an owner to be proposed, and sets the newly proposed owner as step 1 in a 2-step process

proposeRouterOwnershipRenunciation().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the router whitelist has been renounced

proposed().notice: Returns the address of the proposed owner.

proposedTimestamp().notice: Returns the address of the proposed owner.

renounceAssetOwnership().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the asset whitelist has been renounced

renounceOwnership().notice: Renounces ownership of the contract after a delay

renounceRouterOwnership().notice: Indicates if the ownership of the asset whitelist has been renounced

renounced().notice: Indicates if the ownership has been renounced() by checking if current owner is address(0)

routerOwnershipTimestamp().notice: Returns the timestamp when router ownership was last proposed to be renounced

send(uint32,bytes32,address,bool,bytes).notice: Sends a request to execute callback in the originated domain

setXAppConnectionManager(address).notice: Modify the contract the xApp uses to validate Replica contracts
